about_the_game:
A Tournament Spanning All Fantasy Realms!
Join Merlin the Mythical as he brings together countless warriors, scholars, rogues, villains, and heroes from across the ages. Some seek greatness, others redemption, but all have their eyes on the “Ultimate Prize”—one true wish granted to the final victor. Are the Realms ready for the chaos and glory of this timeless test of might and magic?

A Rollicking Roster of Ruffians!
From globetrotting Fishmen and Monster-Trappers to Vampire Queens and more, a diverse host of creatures and characters are here to battle it out! Engage in thrilling combat and survival challenges in the most entertaining and dynamic way possible: by fighting each other! With colosseums, public squares, and sunken pirate ships as your arenas, you can choose from over a dozen unique characters. Each comes with their own stories, play styles, and larger-than-life personalities, fully voice-acted and dynamically animated for your (and Merlin's) amusement.

Experience Epic Rewards!
Every victory in battle earns you heaps of experience points! But fear not, there's also experience to be gained in defeat. Reach milestone levels to receive generous payouts from Merlin as compensation for your efforts. As your characters level up, unlock:
  • Signature Weapons
  • Cosmetics & Reskins
  • Crafting Materials
  • And more!

Dive Into the Runes and Relics Crafting System!
Gather crafting materials from matches to forge powerful Runes and unique Relics. Runes provide combat advantages, such as quick recoveries, breaking enemy combos, or a strength boost to finish off opponents. Relics are unique to each character, altering the effects of your Special Moves and Combos. Customize your fighting style to create a wholly unique experience with each battle!

Online Versus Mode!
The whole world of whoop-ass awaits in online matches! Compete head-to-head in Ranked and Casual Matches, Tournaments, and Private Matches with friends and frenemies. Climb the Weekly Leaderboards to prove you're the Champion of Champions—at least for a little while.

Get ready to step into the arena and claim your place among the legends!
